thread.title: Family pays tribute to 'loving, caring son' killed in crash
thread.title_full: Family pays tribute to 'loving, caring son' killed in crash | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Family pays tribute to 'loving, caring son' killed in crash
text:
Thomas Cody was a passenger in a car which crashed near Llantrisant last night. Credit: Family photo The family of a man killed in a car crash near Llantrisant last night have paid tribute to him.
Thomas Cody, 24, from Cilfynydd in Pontypridd, was a passenger in a purple Citroen Picasso which crashed on the A4119 at Groesfaen at around 7.40pm.
Our loving kind caring son, brother, grandson, uncle and nephew cruelly taken away from us far too soon. As a family we are heartbroken and devastated.
– Thomas Cody's family tribute South Wales Police is appealing for any witnesses to the collision to contact 101 quoting reference number 1700068432.
Last updated Wed 22 Feb 2017 South Wales
